text:
@SenKamalaHarris <new study found that unless we reduce the number of detained people in ICE detention centers, up to 100% of immigrants ... could contract COVID-19 within 90 days>
There are ZERO% immigrants being detained. You're conflating Illegal Aliens with <ahem> "immigrants". #ZeroPercent
